featureDesc: You have developed an ability to Bind and control Arcane Energy using the strength of your emotions and instincts.
featureBenDesc: You may learn and use Primal Arcane Powers. Add +1d4 Charge to your Charge roll result.

featureDesc: You have harnessed your physical being and its movements to capture and control Arcane Energy.
featureBenDesc: You may now use your Physical Ability modifier dice instead of your Mental Ability modifier dice when making any Magic Use/Attack check rolls for Arcane Magic.

featureDesc: You have harnessed your spiritual being and its emotions to capture and control Arcane Energy.
featureBenDesc: You may now use your Spiritual Ability modifier dice instead of your Mental Ability modifier dice when making any Magic Use/Attack check rolls for Arcane Magic.

featureDesc: You can use Sorcery to bind Arcane Energy into a mundane weapon and temporarily cause it to become an item of Arcane Power.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action, if you spend one Charge, you may empower a mundane weapon (melee, ranged, or unarmed attack) with a +1d4 Arcane Enhancement bonus to Combat Attack check rolls 10 full rounds. As a free action, you may maintain a weapon so empowered by spending another 1 Charge for each additional 10 rounds. As long as a weapon is empowered, it is considered to be a Magic Weapon.

featureDesc: You have learned to wield Arcane Energy as a destructive force.
featureBenDesc: When using Arcane Magic in combat to deal damage, you may add +1d4 to your Combat check roll.
featureNote: You may not take this Feature if you have already taken the Feature Invocation.

featureDesc: You may use Sorcery to Bind and Use Arcane Powers of Primal Darkness.
featureBenDesc: As a standard action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1, you may diminish or remove light from an area with a radius of up to 5' centered on a point that you can see within 30' of yourself. As a free action once per round, you may increase or decrease the level of darkenss within the affected area from dim to complete darkness. As part of this Power, you are able to see within the affected area as though the effect were not present. Initially, the effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result, but may be extended as a Free Action beyond the initial limit by spending an additional Charge for a further number of rounds equal to a new Use Magic Check roll result. Also, if you and an opponent are both within the Primal Darkness, you may attempt a Touch Combat Check roll against the targeted opponent in order to lower her Ticker Value by 1d4. You may do this once per round as a Partial Action. Targeted individuals are allowed a Spiritual Defense Check roll against your Use Magic check in order to negate this loss.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Primal Light and negate the effects of both.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Primal Darkness to shroud and protect you.
featureBenDesc: As a Full Round Action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1d4+1, you may manifest an Arcane Presence of Darkness. This Presence rises up around you to dim the level of all light within your Reach. While near you, others feel a little unsure. The effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result + the Charge cost. Before Cloaked in Darkness ends, you may continue the effect as a Free Action by spending 1 additional Charge and making a new Use Magic Check roll to establish how many rounds the effect will continue. This Power provides you with 10% Concealment against all Ranged and Melee attacks. Creatures who you touch, who touch you without your consent, or who succeed at a Melee Combat Check against you will suffer 1d6 points of Shadow Damage and loss from Ticker Value for each instance of contact. Additionally, while Cloaked in Darkness, you automatically gain the effects from the Feature Primal Darkness without having to decrease your current Charge.
featureNote: You may only have one Arcane Presence active at a time. This effect will remain until dismissed or until you lose consciousness.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Primal Darkness to attack your foes.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Cloaked by Darkness, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to gain the ability to target one opponent each round with a ranged Magic attack. The ability lasts as long as your current Cloaked in Darkness effect. Darkbolt must be re-manifested with 1 additional Charge each time your Cloak is renewed. The Darkbolt deals +1d6 points of additional damage on a successful Magic Attack Check roll. Also, the target must reduce her Ticker Value by a number equal to the additional damage dealt by this attack.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Primal Darkness to enhance your weapon.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Cloaked by Darkness, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to use your Empower Weapon ability empower a mundane weapon with Primal Darkness. The ability lasts as long as your current Cloaked in Darkness effect. Darkblade must be re-manifested with 1 additional Charge each time your Cloak is renewed. By using this ability, your Empowered Weapon now gains a +1d6 Arcane Enhancement Bonus instead of +1d4. Also, the weapon deals +1d6 points of additional damage on a successful Combat Attack Check roll and causes the damaged opponent to lose an equal amount of points from her Ticker Value.
featureNote: If the weapon leaves your hand for more than one round, the effect is negated. This effect may only be used once per Encounter and only on a single weapon.

featureDesc: You may use Sorcery to Bind and Use Arcane Powers of Primal Flame.
featureBenDesc: As a standard action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1, you may ignite a flame centered on a point that you can see within 30' of yourself. Unattended combustable material will catch fire. As a free action once per round, you may increase or decrease the size of an active fire within the affected area from embers to a complete blaze.  Increasing a fire's size in this way will cause it to burn through its fuel at a faster rate. Initially, the effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result, but may be extended as a Free Action beyond the initial limit by spending 1 additional Charge for a further number of rounds equal to a new Use Magic Check roll result. Also, if you and an opponent are both within 10' of the same active fire, as a Ranged Combat attack, you may attempt to direct a spark of flame toward the target. The ranged attack deals Fire damage, and a damaged individual must take a Standard Action before your next Turn to roll a Physical Action check against 1d4 + fire damage suffered in order to extinquish the Flame or else suffer 1d4 points of additional Fire damage each round until the Flame is put out.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Primal Frost and negate the effects of both.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Primal Flame to surround and protect you.

While near you, others feel a bit warmer. The effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result + the Charge cost. Before Wreathed in Flames ends, you may continue the effect as a Free Action by spending 1 additional Charge and making a new Use Magic Check roll to establish how many rounds the effect will continue. This effect negates ½ of all Fire and Cold damage dealt to you. Additionally, while Wreathed in Flames, you automatically gain the effects from the Feature Primal Flame without having to decrease your current Charge.

Such damage must have been lost within the Current Encounter and cannot have been lost due to round progression.

featureDesc: You can use Sorcery to Invoke the Primal Power of Fear.
featureBenDesc: As a standard action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1, you may manifest a feeling of Dread within a Living target that you can see within 30' of yourself. You appear Fearsome and Intimidating to the target. While targeted by this ability, you gain a +1d4 bonus to all rolls made against this target. As a free action once per round, you may change the target of this ability to another Living opponent that you can see within 30' of you. Initially, the effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result, but may be extended as a Free Action beyond the initial limit by spending an additional Charge for a further number of rounds equal to a new Use Magic Check roll result. Also, if you succeed at a Touch Combat Check roll against the targeted opponent you can lower the target's Current Modifier value by 1d4. If this Value is lowered below 0 due to this ability, it will not also affect the target's Health. You may do this once per round as a Partial Action. Targeted individuals are allowed a Spiritual Defense Check roll against your Use Magic check in order to negate this loss.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Primal Love and negate the effects of both.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Primal Power of Fear to protect you.
featureBenDesc: As a Full Round Action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1d4+1, you may manifest an Arcane Presence of Fear. This Presence inspires dread in those who see you.  While near you, others feel a bit frightened. The effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Use Magic Check roll result + the Charge cost. While using this Presence, opponents who choose to engage with you during Combat must succeed at a Spiritual Defense Check agains your Use Magic Check or else move away from you and choose a different opponent. If a Living creature does choose to enter into combat with you, you gain a +1d6 bonus to all rolls against the opponent. Additionally, while in Dreadful Guise, you automatically gain the effects from the Feature Primal Fear without having to decrease your current Charge.
featureNote: You may only have one Arcane Presence active at a time. This effect will remain until dismissed or until you lose consciousness.

By using this ability, anyone who enters Combat with this target gains a +1d6 Arcane Enhancement Bonus to all rolls against the target. Also, if the target fails at a Spiritual Defense roll agains your Use Magic check the target must decrease its Ticker and Modifier Values by 1d4.
featureNote: This ability may only affect targets that are able to hear your words.

featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Primal Fear and negate the effects of both.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Darkness to enhance your weapon.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Deeper Darkness, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to use your Empower Weapon ability to empower a mundane weapon with Enhanced Darkness. The ability lasts as long as your current Deeper Darkness effect. Your Empowered Weapon effect increases from +1d6 to +1d8 and the weapon deals +1d8 points of additional damage on a successful Combat Attack Check roll and causes the damaged opponent to lose an equal amount of points from her Ticker Value.
featureNote: If the weapon leaves your hand for more than one round, the effect is negated. This effect may only be used once per Encounter and only on a single weapon.

featureDesc: You may use Sorcery to Bind and Use Arcane Powers of Enhanced Flame.
featureBenDesc: Your Primal Flame may now be within 50' of yourself. Enhanced Flame lasts until the end of the Current Encounter and does not need to be maintained. Also, if you and an opponent are both within 20' of the same active fire, as a Ranged Combat attack, you may attempt to direct a spark of flame toward the target. The ranged attack deals Fire damage, and a damaged individual must take a Standard Action before your next Turn to roll a Physical Action check against 1d6 + fire damage suffered in order to extinquish the Flame or else suffer 1d6 points of additional Fire damage each round until the Flame is put out.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Enhanced Frost and negate the effects of both. This will overpower and negate the effects of Primal Frost.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Flame to surround and protect you.
featureBenDesc: Your Flame Presence now lasts until the end of the current Encounter and does not need to be maintained. This effect no negates 3/4 of all Fire and 1/2 of all Cold damage dealt to you. Creatures who you touch, who touch you without your consent, or who succeed at a Melee Combat Check against you will suffer 1d8 points of Fire Damage and must take a Standard Action before your next Turn to roll a Physical Action check against 1d8 + fire damage suffered in order to extinquish the Flame or else suffer 1d6 points of additional Fire damage each round until the Flame is put out. Additionally, while Wreathed in Flames, you automatically gain the effects from the Feature Enhanced Flame without having to decrease your current Charge.
featureNote: You may only have one Arcane Presence active at a time. This effect will remain until dismissed or until you lose consciousness.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Flame to attack your foes.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Hotter Flames, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to gain the ability to target one opponent each round with a ranged Magic attack. The ability lasts as long as your current Hotter Flames effect. The Flamebolt deals +1d8 points of additional Fire damage on a successful Magic Attack Check roll. Also, the target must take a Standard Action before your next Turn to roll a Physical Action check against 1d8 + fire damage suffered in order to extinquish the Flame or else suffer 1d8 points of additional Fire damage each round until the Flame is put out.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Flame to enhance your weapon.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Hotter Flames, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to use your Improved Empower Weapon ability to empower a mundane weapon with Enhanced Flame. The ability lasts as long as your current Hotter Flames effect. By using this ability, your Improved Empowered Weapon now gains a +1d8 Arcane Enhancement Bonus instead of +1d6. Also, the weapon deals +1d8 points of additional Fire damage on a successful Combat Attack Check roll and the target must take a Standard Action before your next Turn to roll a Physical Action check against 1d8 + fire damage suffered in order to extinquish the Flame or else suffer 1d8 points of additional Fire damage each round until the Flame is put out.
featureNote: If the weapon leaves your hand for more than one round, the effect is negated. This effect may only be used once per Encounter and only on a single weapon.

featureDesc: You may use Sorcery to Bind and Use Arcane Powers of Enhanced Frost.
featureBenDesc: As a standard action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1, you may reduce the temperature in 5' radiius area centered on a point that you can see within 50' of yourself. The effect will freeze water within the affected area and leave an icy coating on other items. As a free action once per round, you may increase or decrease the temperature within the affected area from icy to only cool. The ability lasts until the end of the Current Encounter. Also, each round that a living creature remains within the area of effect, it must succeed at a Physical Activity Check roll against your Use Magic result or else suffer a decrease to Ticker value by 1d6.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Enhanced Flame and negate the effects of both. This will overpower and negate the effects of Primal Flame.

featureDesc: You can use the Enhanced Power of Frost to encase and protect you.
featureBenDesc: As a Full Round Action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1d4+1, you may manifest an Enhanced Arcane Presence of Frost. The effect lasts untile the end of the current Encounter. This effect now negates 3/4 of all Cold and 1/2 of all Fire damage dealt to you. Creatures who you touch, who touch you without your consent, or who succeed at a Melee Combat Check against you will now suffer 1d8 points of Cold Damage and Ticker Value loss. Additionally, while using Colder Ice, you automatically gain the effects from the Feature Enhanced Frost without having to decrease your current Charge.
featureNote: You may only have one Arcane Presence active at a time. This effect will remain until dismissed or until you lose consciousness.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Frost to attack your foes.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Colder Ice, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to gain the ability to target one opponent each round with a ranged Magic attack. The ability lasts as long as your current Colder Ice effect. Frostbolt must be re-manifested with an additional Charge each time your Presence is renewed. The Frostbolt deals +1d6 points of additional Cold damage and Ticker Value loss on a successful Magic Attack Check roll.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Frost to enhance your weapon.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Colder Ice, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to use your Improved Empower Weapon ability to empower a mundane weapon with Enhanced Frost. The ability lasts as long as your current Colder Ice effect. By using this ability, your Empowered Weapon now gains a +1d8 Arcane Enhancement Bonus instead of +1d6. Also, the weapon deals +1d8 points of additional Cold damage and Ticker Value loss on a successful Magic Attack Check roll.
featureNote: If the weapon leaves your hand for more than one round, the effect is negated. This effect may only be used once per Encounter and only on a single weapon.

featureDesc: You may use Sorcery to Bind and Use Arcane Powers of Enhanced Light.
featureBenDesc: As a standard action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1, you may create or brighten radiant light from an area with a radius of up to 5' centered on a point that you can see within 50' of yourself. As a free action once per round, you may increase or decrease the level of brightness within the affected area from dim to full. The effect lasts until the end of the Current Encounter. Also, if you and another living creature are both within the Enhanced Light, you may attempt to Touch the targeted creature in order to raise her Ticker Value by 1d6. You may do this once per round as a Partial Action. Undead, Demonic, and Infernal creatures Targeted with this Touch are allowed a Spiritual Defense Check roll against your Use Magic check or else suffer 1d6 points of loss to Ticker Value.
featureNote: The effects of this Power will counter the effects from Enhanced Darkness and negate the effects of both. This will overpower and negate the effects of Primal Darkness.

featureDesc: You can use the Primal Power of Light to surround and protect you.
featureBenDesc: As a Full Round Action, by decreasing your Charge Count by 1d4+1, you may manifest an Enhanced Arcane Presence of Light. This Presence radiates from you and illuminates all within your Reach. The effect lasts until the end of the Current Encounter. This effect provides a 50% Block against all Demonic, Infernal, and Undead attackers. Such creatures who you touch, who touch you without your consent, or who succeed at a Melee Combat Check against you will suffer 1d8 points of Radiant Damage and loss from Ticker Value for each instance of contact. Allies who you Touch may restore 1d8 lost hit points to their Current Health Value and as many lost points from their Ticker Value. Restored Ticker points must have been lost during the Current Encounter and must have been lost due to damage not round progression. Additionally, while using Brighter Light, you automatically gain the effects from the Feature Enhanced Light without having to decrease your current Charge.
featureNote: You may only have one Arcane Presence active at a time. This effect will remain until dismissed or until you lose consciousness.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Light to attack Evil foes and to aid your allies.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Brighter Light, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to gain the ability to target one opponent each round with a ranged Magic attack. The ability lasts as long as your current Brighter Light effect. The Shining Bolt deals +1d8 points of additional damage on a successful Magic Attack Check roll against Demonic, Infernal, and Undead targets. Also, the target must reduce its Ticker Value by a number equal to the additional damage dealt by this attack. Living allies targeted by this ability will restore 1d8 points of lost damage to their Current Health and Ticker Values.  Such damage must have been lost within the Current Encounter and cannot have been lost due to round progression.

featureDesc: You can use the Arcane Power of Enhanced Light to enhance your weapon.
featureBenDesc: As a Partial Action if you are using Brighter Light, you may decrease your Charge Count by 1 to use your Improved Empower Weapon ability to empower a mundane weapon with Enhanced Light. The ability lasts as long as your current Brighter Light effect. By using this ability, your Empowered Weapon now gains a +1d8 Arcane Enhancement Bonus instead of +1d6. Also, against Demonic, Infernal, and Undead opponents the weapon deals +1d8 points of additional damage on a successful Combat Attack Check roll and causes the damaged opponent to lose an equal amount of points from her Ticker Value.
featureNote: If the weapon leaves your hand for more than one round, the effect is negated. This effect may only be used once per Encounter and only on a single weapon.
